HOME_PAGE.TITLE: WireLess
HOME_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Your intelligent self-configuring circuit prototyping system. Choose your path to innovation.

CARDS.TITLE: Smart Start Mode
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: A guided, step-by-step wizard perfect for beginners or quick prototyping. Let WireLess intelligently configure your circuit.

CARDS.TITLE: Pro Mode
CARDS.DESCRIPTION: Full control and advanced features for experienced users. Design, simulate, and optimize with precision.
